FlavorTextOption.Text: We have received vital intelligence regarding the discovery of Subspace Streams. These streams allow ships to traverse instantly between different galactic sectors. This represents both an unprecedented opportunity and a considerable threat. [BR][BR] The influx of various civilizations into our space region necessitates prudence and diplomacy. Your foremost task is reminiscent of our previous challenge: to forge a coalition akin to the one we established during the Dread Lord crisis years past. [BR][BR] Establishing alliances will undoubtedly pose challenges, but we are not without resources and strategies. Trade negotiations, stationing seasoned diplomats, and researching advanced diplomatic techniques will be invaluable. It is imperative that you strive to form solid alliances with these emerging civilizations.
